verbs.description: While [V: advocating] [ARG1: for labor rights] [ARGM-LOC: at a May Day march in south Minneapolis] [ARGM-TMP: Tuesday] , [ARG0: protesters] also took special aim at President Donald Trump and his immigration policies .

[ARGM-TMP: While advocating for labor rights at a May Day march in south Minneapolis Tuesday] , [ARG0: protesters] [ARGM-DIS: also] [V: took] [ARG1: special aim at President Donald Trump and his immigration policies] .
